application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to condition 23 (Material details), of Full Planning Permission application reference 23/2811 dated 17/04/24 for Erection of 2 purpose-built student accommodation buildings with basement level (Sui Generis) connected at ground floor level by a podium together with ancillary communal facilities, internal and external communal amenity space, cycle parking, mechanical plant, hard and soft landscaping, new public realm, play space and other associated works. This application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement.Subject to Deed of Agreement dated 16th April 2024 under Section 106 of Town and Country Planning Act, 1990, as amended
site_name: Land rear of 390 - 408, High Road, Wembley, HA9
